section.name: Goto a Document
section.span: How to get to a screen to manipulate a particular document.

div.p: Opened the tab for the document 'multibazaar2008', which is a document in the folder 'sar newspaper'. For the document, there are subtabs 'Edit' and 'Publish request' and 'Delete request'. The 'multibazaar2008' document has a structure definition containing the fields: Date of happening, Title, Indoors?, Recurring? and Description. Except for Description, they all are mandatory (this is shown by the * signs).

section.p: While a folder is selected, click on a document name in the list at middle right. The document tab opens to the right.
